markdown:
<title level="1" right="Spell 5" pfs="Standard">
[Telekinetic Haul](/Spells.aspx?ID=1716)
<actions string="Two Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Concentrate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=32" />
<trait label="Manipulate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=104" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 362 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Traditions**
[Arcane](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=1), [Occult](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=3)

**Deities**
[Good Neighbors](/Deities.aspx?ID=368), [Nethys](/Deities.aspx?ID=288), [Zipacna](/Deities.aspx?ID=604)

<row gap="medium">

 

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** 120 feet

**Target** 1 unattended object of up to 80 Bulk with no dimension longer than 20 feet
</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Duration** sustained up to 1 minute
</row>

</column>

---

You move the target up to 20 feet, potentially suspending it in midair. When you Sustain the spell, you can do so again, or you can shift your telekinetic focus to a different eligible target within range, moving it instead.
name: Telekinetic Haul

<traits>
<trait label="Concentrate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=32" />
<trait label="Manipulate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=104" />
</traits>

<additional-info>
**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 362 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Traditions**
[Arcane](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=1), [Occult](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=3)

**Deities**
[Good Neighbors](/Deities.aspx?ID=368), [Nethys](/Deities.aspx?ID=288), [Zipacna](/Deities.aspx?ID=604)

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** 120 feet

 

**Target** 1 unattended object of up to 80 Bulk with no dimension longer than 20 feet
</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Duration** sustained up to 1 minute
</row>
</additional-info>

---

<summary>
Move a large object.
</summary>
target: 1 unattended object of up to 80 Bulk with no dimension longer than 20 feet
target_markdown: 1 unattended object of up to 80 Bulk with no dimension longer than 20 feet
text: Telekinetic Haul Two Actions Source Player Core pg. 362 2.0 Traditions Arcane, Occult Deities Good Neighbors, Nethys, Zipacna Range 120 feet Target 1 unattended object of up to 80 Bulk with no dimension longer than 20 feet Duration sustained up to 1 minute --- You move the target up to 20 feet, potentially suspending it in midair. When you Sustain the spell, you can do so again, or you can shift your telekinetic focus to a different eligible target within range, moving it instead.
